short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improves readability for Unity Bug Reporter Cases on FogBugz by pulling in connected Issues and details.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improves readability for Unity Technologies' Bug Reporter Cases on FogBugz by pulling in connected Issues and details.

→ Shows total number of cases
→ Shows number of responses for each case
→ Pulls in all IssueTracker links mentioned in responses
→ Shows details for each mentioned Issue
→ Moves the case details to a sidebar that can be shown/hidden
→ Loads in case details dynamically instead of loading the full page again

Disclaimer: This is an unofficial extension and is in no way affiliated with or endorsed by Unity Technologies.
